summary: This is an email from an unidentified sender at USAFLS to Jay Lefkowitz, with a copy to Alex Acosta, transmitting the latest version of a letter to Judge Davis regarding the Epstein case. The email includes an attachment named '071015_Special_Master_LetterS.wpd'.

persons.name: Jay Lefkowitz
persons.context: He is the primary recipient of an email containing the latest version of a letter to Judge Davis regarding the Epstein case.

persons.name: Alex Acosta
persons.context: He was the U.S. Attorney for the Southern District of Florida at the time and was copied on an email transmitting a letter to Judge Davis about the Epstein case.

persons.name: Judge Davis
persons.context: A judge who was to receive a letter regarding the Epstein case, as referenced in the email subject and body.

connections.description: Both are involved in legal correspondence regarding the Epstein case, with Lefkowitz as the primary recipient and Acosta copied on the email.
Acosta is involved in correspondence (via copy) regarding a letter being sent to Judge Davis about the Epstein case.

events.title: Email transmitting letter to Judge Davis
events.description: An email was sent transmitting the latest version of a letter to Judge Davis regarding the Epstein case.

keyFacts: The email is dated October 24, 2007, and discusses a letter to Judge Davis regarding the Epstein case.
Alex Acosta, then U.S. Attorney for the Southern District of Florida, was copied on the correspondence.
The attachment is named '071015_Special_Master_LetterS.wpd', suggesting it relates to a Special Master in the Epstein case.
